duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in examination and treatment of patients under the direction of a physician.
Prepare treatment rooms for examination of patients, clean rooms after procedures, and restock supplies.
Help and accompany patients from waiting room, and prepare patients for examination.
Interview patients, record/input information to patients' medical record, and collect all medical data.
Measure, collect, and record patient's vital signs, and prepare patients for examinations, tests, procedures, and x-rays.
Perform routine patient testing, acquire and process electrocardiograms, and collect and process blood specimens and urine samples.
Prepare and administer routine medication, injections, and vaccinations, as directed by Physician, and identify and report adverse reactions.
Remove sutures and staples, and change sterile and non-sterile dressings, as requested.
